daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: Recent updates in NYC include the approval of a 12,000-unit rezoning in Jamaica, a significant murder charge following a deadly brawl, and a push for graphic cautionary images in gun shops, amidst ongoing discussions about affordable housing and public safety measures ahead of the mayoral election.

civics_politics.title: Civics & Politics
